hero.tagline: Passionate software engineer with expertise in full-stack development, creating robust web applications and innovative solutions in Kuala Lumpur

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: I am a passionate software engineer with 4+ years of experience developing full-stack applications in Kuala Lumpur
about.storyContent: I have {years} years of software development experience, specializing in full-stack web applications using C#, .NET, and modern JavaScript frameworks. Since starting my career in 2020, I've worked with various technologies across frontend and backend development.
about.storyContent2: My expertise spans from traditional ASP.NET MVC applications to modern web APIs and Vue.js frontend development. I believe in writing clean, maintainable code and delivering solutions that provide excellent user experience.
about.storyContent3: Currently based in Kuala Lumpur, I enjoy tackling complex technical challenges and continuously learning new technologies to stay current with industry trends.
